name: Italian Chips
author: CHEFGLORIA
summary: I have used this recipe for Italian Nachos and it is always a favorite as a appetizer before any Italian dinner or cocktail party. I am also submitting this for someone who was looking for a recipe on Italian chips on this site.
ingredients: ¾ cup freshly grated Parmigiano-Reggiano cheese
directions: Preheat oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C)
Prepare a baking sheet with cooking spray
Arrange the wonton wrappers on the baking sheet in a single layer
Brush each wrapper with egg white; sprinkle with oregano and Parmigiano-Reggiano cheese
Cut each into two triangles using a pizza cutter
Bake in the preheated oven until the edges are brown, 6 to 7 minutes
Transfer to a cooling rack to cool completely
Store in an airtight container up to 2 days
